# events &presentations

## Upcoming Events

There are no upcoming events scheduled at this time.

## Past Events

August 19, 2024 5:00 pm EST

### Digital Brands Group Second Quarter 2024 Conference Call

[View Webcast](https://www.webcaster4.com/Webcast/Page/3044/51112)

December 22, 2023 9:30 am EST

### 2023 Annual Meeting of Shareholders

Registered stockholders and duly appointed proxyholders may connect to the audiocast meeting by dialing one of the following telephone numbers where they can participate, ask questions and vote during the Meeting live audiocast: 866-605-1828 or +1 201-389-0846.

November 14, 2023 5:30 pm EST

### Third Quarter 2023 Earnings Conference Call

## Investor Presentation

June 2023

[ DOWNLOAD PDF ](https://irp.cdn-website.com/606bcc39/files/uploaded/DBG_Deck_LD_Micro_June_2023.pdf)

info@digitalbrandsgroup.co

Los Angeles, CA

Digital Brands Group is a modern retail ecosystem; a collective reshaping the shopping experience by personalizing styled looks based on consumer preferences. We streamline brand discovery, craft unique personal style experiences and build a sustainable closet that delivers value and confidence with every wear.

Share by:
